overview_of_class: This course will focus on Black women's perspectives on the environment?that is, the ways in which Black women experience, narrate, and analyze the relationship between humans and nature, non-human life, and land.  The course will not be a traditional literature course.  Rather it will weave Black women's writing in history, political economy, and sociology with autobiography, poetry, and speculative fiction.  The class will include units on remembering erased landscapes of slavery, environmental justice, Hurricane Katrina, and Black women writing on the future of human/ non-human relationships.
name: Black Women Writers
subject: AF_AM_ST
